scientific_advisor.details: Ronald C. and Antonia V. Nielsen Professor of Computing and Information Science, the director of the Institute for Computational Sustainability at Cornell University, and co-director of the Cornell University AI for Science Institute.
scientific_advisor.name: Carla P. Gomes

scientific_advisor.aff: Harvard University, Massachusetts Institute of Technology
scientific_advisor.details: Founding Core Faculty & Lead of Synthetic Biology at Wyss Institute at Harvard University. Robert Winthrop Professor of Genetics at Harvard Medical School. Professor of Health Sciences and Technology at Harvard and MIT.
scientific_advisor.name: George Church

scientific_advisor.details: James S. McDonnell Distinguished University Professor of Chemistry at Princeton University.
scientific_advisor.name: David MacMillan

scientific_advisor.details: Kenneth Fong Professor of Bioengineering, Genetics, Medicine, Biomedical Data Science and Computer Science, and past chairman of the Bioengineering Department at Stanford University.
scientific_advisor.name: Russ B. Altman

scientific_advisor.details: Paul M. Wythes and Marcia R. Wythes Professor in Computer Science. ACM fellow, IEEE fellow, member of the National Academy of Engineering and the Washington State Academy of Sciences.
scientific_advisor.name: Kai Li

scientific_advisor.details: The Barnum-Simons Chair in Mathematics and Statisticsat Stanford University. Professor of Mathematics and of Statistics. Professor of Electrical Engineering (by courtesy). Co-chair of Data Science Institute.
scientific_advisor.name: Emmanuel Candès

steering_committee.aff: University of Amsterdam, CuspAI, Microsoft Research, CIFAR, ELLIS
steering_committee.details: Research Chair in Machine Learning at the University of Amsterdam and Co-founder of CuspAI. Fellow at CIFAR and ELLIS, with prior roles including VP at Qualcomm Technologies and Microsoft Research.
steering_committee.name: Max Welling

steering_committee.aff: Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence, Carnegie Mellon University
steering_committee.details: Professor at Machine Learning Department and  Language Technology Institute & Computer Science Department in the School of Computer Science at Carnegie Mellon University. President at Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence.
steering_committee.name: Eric Xing

steering_committee.details: Thomas Siebel Professor of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science and the Institute for Data, Systems, and Society at MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory.
steering_committee.name: Tommi Jaakkola

steering_committee.details: Group Leader of Cosmology X Data Science, CCA, Simons Foundation. Professor at Department of Physics & Center for Data Science at NYU
steering_committee.name: Shirley Ho

steering_committee.details: Professor at the Center for Statistics and Machine Learning, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, and Department of Computer Science and the Omenn-Darling Bioengineering Institute at Princeton University. Founder and co-director of Princeton AI for Accelerated Invention. Also affiliated with the Princeton ML Theory Group and Princeton Language+Intelligence Initiative. Visiting research scientist at DeepMind, Institute of Advanced Studies, and Simons Institute on Theoretical Computer Science.
steering_committee.name: Mengdi Wang

steering_committee.details: Chief AI Scientist at Meta. Jacob T. Schwartz Professor of Computer Science, Data Science, Neural Science, and Electrical and Computer Engineering, New York University. Member of National Academy of Engineering, National Academy of Sciences, Académie des Sciences. Fellow at ACM, AAAI, AAAS and SIF.
steering_committee.name: Yann LeCun
